K12D0486_H0451:89b-0: @89b / /rgya gar skad du su pra ti shtha ta ntra sam gra ha /
K12D0486_H0451:89b-2: rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud /
K12D0486_H0451:89b-3: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'chal lo //
K12D0486_H0451:89b-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12D0486_H0451:89b-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
K12D0486_H0451:89b-6: dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya
K12D0486_H0451:89b-7: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12D0486_H0451:90a-1: pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
K12D0486_H0451:90a-2: slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-3: mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-4: phyag rgya sngags dang cho ga shes //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-5: las rnams kun la mkhas pas so //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-6: sku gzugs mtshan nyid ldan pa ste //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-7: zhi ba la sogs ro yis ldan //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-8: tshad kyis tshad la phab cing bzang //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-10: yang thog mchod rten sogs gnas dang //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-11: khyim dang lha yi gnas rnams su //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-12: sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas ni //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-13: cho ga dag dang ldan pas bya //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-14: cho ga dman pas mi bya ste //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-15: rab gnas rtag par bkra mi shis //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-17: 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa che; ;de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-18: dngos grub 'dod pas nan tan bya //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-19: cho ga bdag nyid nus pa yis //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-20: brtag pa las gsungs tshul legs pas //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-21: de byas bsod nams che ba ni //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-22: mthong dang mi mthong rnams su skye //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-23: sku gzugs sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyis //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-25: gang du sku gzugs rdzogs pa la //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-26: byin ma brlabs par ring gnas na //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-27: de la bkra mi shis 'byung zhing //
K12D0486_H0451:90a-28: ji srid mchod par de mi 'os //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-0: dper na skyes bu la la zhig @90b rig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa na //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-1: 'jig rten dun gyi mchod mi byed //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-2: de de bzhin du gzugs brnyan de //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-3: rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-4: gang gis mchod cing phyag bed pa //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-5: dam tshig bral zhing sngags dman pas //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-6: sbyin sreg thal ba 'bras med mtshungs //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-7: de bzhin du yang sngags gnas pas //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-8: chos ldan mchod pa byed pa gang //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-9: de yi las kyi rnam smin gyis //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-10: skye pa ru ni mchod par 'gyur //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba /
K12D0486_H0451:90b-13: chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa lags na /
K12D0486_H0451:90b-14: ji ltar na rgyal ba rnams kyis rab tu gnas pa lags /
K12D0486_H0451:90b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0486_H0451:90b-16: sangs rgyas kun ni rab tu bzhugs //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-17: rab tu gnas pa gang na'ang med //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-18: kun tu mkha' ltar gnas pa la //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-19: gcig shos kyis ni rab tu brtags //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-20: 'jig rten kun rdzob la brten nas //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-21: rab tu gnas par rab tu brtags //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-22: dam pa'i don du dpyad pa na //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-23: gang zhig gang gis gang du brlab //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-24: gzod ma nas ni skye med pa //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-25: ci 'dras ji ltar rab tu gnas //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-26: dang po'i las can sems can rnams //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-27: rtogs pa'i rgyu ru bshad par zad //
K12D0486_H0451:90b-28: dang por re zhig yongs su brtags pa'i gnas yongs su sbyangs pa dang /
K12D0486_H0451:91a-2: ba dan bsgreng ba rnams su mchog tu gsol ba
K12D0486_H0451:91a-3: 'debs pas gsol ba btab pa'i bla ma spos dang
K12D0486_H0451:91a-4: / me tog la sogs pa dang ldan pas tshes dang /
K12D0486_H0451:91a-5: rgyu skar shis pa la slob dpon legs par mnyam
K12D0486_H0451:91a-6: par gzhag pas rab tu gnas pa'i sar 'khod de
K12D0486_H0451:91a-8: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs lnga dang rab tu 'brel ba yin la /
K12D0486_H0451:91a-9: de bzhin du rab tu 'brel ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
K12D0486_H0451:91a-10: tshogs sa yongs su gzung zhing thig gdab pa dang
K12D0486_H0451:91a-12: gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas la /
K12D0486_H0451:91a-14: rgyud kyi dgongs pas sa'i gter du nor bu'am /
K12D0486_H0451:91a-16: de nas lha'i khang par rang gi slob ma dang por bcug ste /
K12D0486_H0451:91a-17: rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i skur bltas la /
K12D0486_H0451:91a-18: lha la mngon par phyogs te phyag 'tshal zhing //
K12D0486_H0451:91a-19: ji ltar 'byor ba'i me tog thal mo dang //
K12D0486_H0451:91a-20: dri chu gtsang mas cho ga bzhin brtags la //
K12D0486_H0451:91a-21: ting nge 'dzin la legs gnas pas //
K12D0486_H0451:91a-22: zhabs bsil me tog spos sogs ldan //
K12D0486_H0451:91a-23: rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni //
K12D0486_H0451:91a-24: mchod yon rnams ni phul byas la //
K12D0486_H0451:91a-25: mnyam par gzhag pas sngags 'di yis //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-0: lan @91b gsum par du brjod par bya'o //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-1: aom sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya ho aa ham/
K12D0486_H0451:91b-2: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-3: dga' ldan du ni gnas pa las //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-4: lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-5: de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'dir bzhugs shig /
K12D0486_H0451:91b-6: 'di ru mgon po rtag bzhugs nas //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-7: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-8: 'di zhes bya ba'i don slad du //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-9: bdag gi 'byor pa nyid kyis ni //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-10: ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa rnams //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-11: me tog la sogs 'di bzhes shig /
K12D0486_H0451:91b-12: bdag dang sleb mar bcas pa la //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-13: rjes su brtse bas dgongs su gsol //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-14: kun gyis 'di la byin brlab cing //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-15: de nyis du ni bzhugs par rigs //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-16: sku gzugs sta gon legs byas la //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-17: de nas rtag par mnyam par brtsam //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-18: slob ma smyung bar gnas pa yi //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-19: de ltar thams cad spyad byas la //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-20: sngags pas mchod pa'i cho ga sogs //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-21: bla ma yis ni gang bsgo ba //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-22: ma tshogs pa kun bsgrub par bya //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-24: de nas sngags pas snyan gsan dbab //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-25: gdan la bstim byas mchod yon dang /
K12D0486_H0451:91b-26: mchod pa gtor ma spos me tog /
K12D0486_H0451:91b-27: de bzhin du ni mar me dag /
K12D0486_H0451:91b-28: sngags dang ldan pas dbul bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-29: sku gzugs mdun du phyag byas la //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-30: na bza' ser pos g-yogs bya zhing //
K12D0486_H0451:91b-31: de nas sngags pas 'du bya ba //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-2: de nas bsgrub phyir de la ni //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-3: de la lan gcig gtor bya ba //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-4: de nas de la sngags 'dis na //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-5: me dang de nas chu la gtor //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-6: aom sarba p'a bam da ha na bdzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0486_H0451:92a-9: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-10: don bzhin du ni bsgom bya ste //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-11: de nas gnas gsum rnams su bstim //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-12: aom h'um a'a: yi yi ge gsum //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-13: aom yig sbyin bor bstim bya zhing //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-14: snying gar h'um gi yi ger 'gyur //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-15: ngag gi phyogs su a'a: yig go /
K12D0486_H0451:92a-16: sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub par bya //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-18: gang gi sa bon gang yin pa //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-19: de yi thugs gar de dgod do //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-20: phyag rgya sngags kyis rab bskul zhing //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-21: ci rigs pa ni snyan gsan dbab //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-22: gser ram dngul lam zangs ma'am //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-23: rdo dang de bzhin shing dang ni //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-24: sa 'am dung chos de bzhin te //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-25: yang na shing lo'i 'dab ma rnams //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-26: mchod yon snod du sbyar bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-27: de bzhin bum pa gser la sogs //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-28: zangs ma'i snod kyi mchod yon ni //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-29: mchod yon snod la rab tu shis //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-30: gal te nus pas ma rnyed na //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-31: ji ltar rnyed pas kun tu bya //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-32: de nas dri yi til mar sogs //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-33: d'ur ba'i phon gyi pir gyis sbyang //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-34: bkra shis rnga la sogs pa'i sgras //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-35: na chung rnams kyis de bzhin brjod //
K12D0486_H0451:92a-36: til mar la sogs sngags kyis ni //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-0: @92b aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ni sv'ah'a /
K12D0486_H0451:92b-2: tsandan la sogs rnams kyis byug /
K12D0486_H0451:92b-3: sna tshogs dri chus dgang ba dang //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-4: 'khor lor byas la mngon par bsngags //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-5: bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu 'am //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-6: yang na ras bal skud pa'ang rung //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-7: tshon chen po yis bsgyur byas la //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-8: de la sngags kyis dkri bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-9: sman lngag [?] ni chen lnga dang ni //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-10: me tog 'bras bur ldan pa ste //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-11: sku gsum pa dang yungs kar ldan //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-12: bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-13: gtsug tor rnam rgyal zhes bya dang //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-14: gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi rji dang //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-15: bkra shis zhi rnams sngags kyis ni //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-16: khrus kyi tshad du mngon par bsngags //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-17: 'jam pa'i til mar dag dang ni //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-18: au du ma w'a ra'i lcug [?] ma bzang //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-19: 'khar ba'i snod kyi nang dag tu //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-20: bkod la rab tu dbul bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-21: dri lnga yis ni de dag byug /
K12D0486_H0451:92b-22: sa bon lnga ni gtor bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-23: slob ma tshogs dang bcas pa yis //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-24: sngags kyi gtsang sbras bkru bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-25: bkra shis zhes bya yid 'ong ba'i //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-26: blo dang ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-27: rig ma spyan ma ji bzhin du //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-28: cho ga bzhin du mngon dbang bskur //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-30: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-31: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
K12D0486_H0451:92b-32: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um/
K12D0486_H0451:93a-4: lugs ma rnams ni dngos su bkru //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-5: ri mo rnams ni me long la'o //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-6: dag byed lngas ni sngon du bsgo //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-7: d'ur ba yis ni mnye bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-8: ras sam lag pa dag gis ni //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-9: blo dang ldan pas sku lus phyi //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-10: gur gum mar dang bcas pas bsku //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-11: gos zung dag kyang sku la gsol //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-12: blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di yis //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-13: dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-14: aom dhi bdzra w'a sa se sv'ah'a /
K12D0486_H0451:93a-16: aom bdzra a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'ah'a /
K12D0486_H0451:93a-17: blo ldan gyis rang dam tshig bskul //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-18: phyag rgya sngags kyi dbang bskur ba //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-19: ji ltar 'os par mngon dbang bskur //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-21: de ltar cod pan bcing byas la //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-22: gdan la legs par bzhugs gsol te //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-23: brtag pa las gsungs tshul gyis so //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-24: mdun phyogs su ni ma bub cing //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-25: yo ba min zhing drang ba yis //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-26: de ltar sku gzugs mdzes par dgod //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-28: me tog spos dang de bzhin dri //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-29: mar me na bza' sogs 'byor gang //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-30: de kun sngags dang ldan pa yis //
K12D0486_H0451:93a-31: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-0: zhes bya ba 'di dag la @93b sogs pas so //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-1: mchog gi me tog 'di dag ni //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-2: chu dang thang las de bzhin skyes //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-3: mchog tu dad pas khyod la 'bul //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-4: ci bde bar ni so sor bzhes //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-5: lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-6: mchog gi bdug pa 'di dag ni //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-7: bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-8: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-9: lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-10: mchog tu gyur pa'i dri 'di ni //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-11: mchog gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-12: ci bde bar ni so sor bzhes //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-13: mun pa 'joms byed snang ba'i mchog /
K12D0486_H0451:93b-14: mar dang til gyi mar me 'di //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-15: yang dag ye shes spyan dbye phyir //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-16: dad pas bdag gis dbul bar bgyi //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-17: bza' dang bca' ba phun sum tshogs //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-18: kha dog dri ro rnams dang ldan //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-19: thams cad ldan pa'i lha yi bshos //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-20: bdag gis dbul gyis so sor bzhes //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-21: de la sogs pa gang yang yung //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-22: cung zad ci 'byor sku gzugs la //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-23: de dag thams cad 'di nyid kyis /
K12D0486_H0451:93b-24: rim pa yis ni dbul bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-25: sngags kyi gtsang sbra ts'a ru bya //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-26: der ni gser gyi rang bzhin gyi //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-27: thur mas spyan ni dbye bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-28: zhal zas der dbul blo ldan pas //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-29: aom tsakshu: tsakshu: sa manta tsakshu bi sho dha ni sv'ah'a /
K12D0486_H0451:93b-30: aom dh+y'a na sa m'a dhi pri na ne sv'a h'a /
K12D0486_H0451:93b-31: de ltar bzlas te de nas yang //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-32: slob ma rab tu bcug byas la //
K12D0486_H0451:93b-33: khyod kyis nga la gang gsol ba'i //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-1: gzugs dag ni khyad par du //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-2: ji ltar gsungs pa'i rab gnas par //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-3: de dag don ni nges byas te //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-4: de rnams don ni grub zin gyi //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-5: ci bde bar ni mchod par byos //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-6: de nas dam tshig dbang bskur bar //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-7: khyod la byas kyis sreg blugs ni //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-8: stong ngam yang na de yi phyed //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-9: sngar gsungs par mas 'bru rnams kyis /
K12D0486_H0451:94a-10: 'o ma can gyi bud shing la //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-11: sreg khung gru bzhir sreg blugs bya //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-12: de nyid mar dang 'o ma yis //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-13: lhag ma ts'a rur phul byas la //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-14: bdag dang slob ma thams cad ni //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-15: zhi dang rgyas pa 'phel bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-16: aom bdzra a'a yu she sv'ah'a /
K12D0486_H0451:94a-17: a'a gatstsha ha ri padgi le te dza te dza
K12D0486_H0451:94a-18: ha lo gi ta ksha de hi da ba ya
K12D0486_H0451:94a-19: ai dam tsa l+ye k'ar+yan ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12D0486_H0451:94a-21: de ltar byas la 'bad pa yis //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-22: khri yi steng du bzhugs par bya //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-23: sku gzugs kyi ni sum 'gyur cha'i //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-24: tshad tsam du ni rab tu brtag /
K12D0486_H0451:94a-25: aom su pra tishtha bdzre sv'ah'a /
K12D0486_H0451:94a-26: me tog spos sogs sngon 'gro bas //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-27: phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod par bya //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-29: zhes bya bas dbang ldan la thug gi bar du
K12D0486_H0451:94a-30: rol mo'i sgra la sogs pas yang dag par mchod
K12D0486_H0451:94a-31: de gshegs su gsol bar bya ba ni /
K12D0486_H0451:94a-32: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-33: tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs rnams dang //
K12D0486_H0451:94a-34: gang dag chog ga ma tshang ba //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-0: de dag bzod pa mdzad @94b bar rigs //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-1: kun tu zhi dang rgyas pa ru //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-2: yon bdag tshe la rab mdzad nas //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-3: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-4: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-5: sa dang chu dang me rlung gi /
K12D0486_H0451:94b-6: lha rnams kun gyi sku gzugs la //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-7: bskal ba brgya ru bsrung gnas mdzod //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-8: dgyes shing yid bzang gyur nas su //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-9: slob dpon slob mar bcas pa yi //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-10: bu dang tsha po bsrung mdzad nas //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-11: rang gnas bde bar gshegs su gsol //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-12: dpyid zla ra ba'am dpyid zla 'bring //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-13: dgun dang dpyid kyi tha chungs sam //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-14: dbyar ra de bzhin dbyar 'bring po //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-15: nyi ma byang du gnas pa yi //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-16: dkar po'i phyogs kyi gnyis pa'am //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-17: rim bzhin de ltar gsum pa 'am //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-18: gang tshe gza' dang rjes mthun //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-19: nag po'i phyogs la'ang brtsam par bya //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-20: gang tshe thams cad mthun gyur na //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-21: mi rnams yun du 'phel bar byed //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-22: bco lnga de bzhin brgyad pa dang //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-23: bcu gsum pa yang de bzhin no //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-24: gnam stong dang ni de bzhin du //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-25: bcu bzhi pa la'ang bya ba min //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-26: thams cad du ni chu smad dang /
K12D0486_H0451:94b-27: snar ma gro zhun de bzhin te //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-28: lag pa snubs dang snron dang ni //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-29: rgyal dang chu smad de bzhin no //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-30: khrums smad dag kyang de bzhin te //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-31: rgyu skar 'di rnams thams cad du //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-32: skye dgu 'phel zhing de yi ni //
K12D0486_H0451:94b-33: rab tu gnas pa'i mchog tu byed //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-2: des ni shes rab chen por 'gyur //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-3: yid la 'dod pa ci yang rung //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-4: dngos grub me bzhis ster bar 'gyur //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-5: lus las shes pa yang dag pa //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-6: khrums sam yang na gro bzhin gyis //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-7: lag gis skal bzang snar mas ni //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-8: gzhan dag las ni rgyal bar byed //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-9: mgo yis zhi ba nye bar ston //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-10: chu stod kyis ni bu dag gson //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-11: rtag par dngos grub khrums smad kyis //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-12: rgyal gyis rtag par tshe ring 'gyur //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-13: snron gyis mchog tu ba de bar byed //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-14: lha mtshams kyis ni mchog ster 'gyur //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-15: phur bu lag dang pa ba sangs //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-16: zla ba gza' sogs shes bya ste //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-17: 'di rnams bzang ldan la byas na //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-18: rab tu gnas pa mchog tu dge /
K12D0486_H0451:95a-19: gsum pa drug pa bdun pa la //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-20: bcu dang bcu gcig la zla ba //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-21: gnyis pa bzhi pa de bzhin brgyad //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-22: bcu dang bcu gcig rnams la lag //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-23: gnyis dang bdun dang de bzhin dgu /
K12D0486_H0451:95a-24: de bzhin phur bu bcu gcig pa //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-25: dus sbyor zhi ba las brten nas //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-26: de la lhag par gnas par bya //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-27: drug bdun bcu pa dor ba yis //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-28: pa ba sangs nyid dge ba yin //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-29: de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-30: stobs ldan mi ldan der shes bya //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-31: gang tshe zhi ba'i gza' rnams dang //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-32: zhing rnams zhi ba dge ba yin //
K12D0486_H0451:95a-33: dang po lnga pa gsum de bzhin //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-0: nor @95b rnams 'joms pa spang bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-1: rjes su mthun par byed pa pos //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-2: skad cig de la yongs 'grub cing //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-3: ji ltar gsungs bzhin kun byas na //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-4: rab tu gnas pa mchog 'gyur zhing //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-5: 'khor los bsgyur rgyal dbang phyug ni //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-6: thob 'gyur de la the tshom med //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-7: gza' dang rgyu skar der med de //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-8: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-9: gza' rnams thams cad rjes mthun zhing //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-10: bgegs dang rgyu skar lha rnams nyid //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-11: de ru grub par kun gnas shing //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-12: gzugs brnyan mchod rten la sogs kyi //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-13: dngos grub dag ni ster bar mdzad //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-14: yid kyis cung zad gang bsams pa //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-16: rgyan rnams ma lus pa yis ni //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-17: phyi nas bzo bo rnams la mchod //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-18: gang dag de la grogs byed pa //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-19: gzhan dag kyang ni mchod par bya //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-20: de nas de dag thams cad la //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-21: dga' bas 'di skad brjod par bya //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-22: ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnams //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-23: bdag la mthun pa'i nus pa med //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-24: de phyir khyod la bdag bzod gsol //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-25: sngags kyis gtsang sbra'i bza' bca' dag /
K12D0486_H0451:95b-26: gzugs brnyan dag la sbyin bya ste //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-27: bder gshegs lhag ma 'di dag ni //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-28: zo zhig sdig pa byang bar 'gyur //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-30: glang po rta glang shing rta nor //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-31: yon gyi dam pa dbul bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:95b-32: de nas de la nan tan gyis //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-1: spyod g-yo ba dbul bar bya //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-2: gal te lha nyid dgyes 'dod na //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-3: bla ma gus pas dgyes bya zhing //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-4: de ltar rnam pa thams cad du //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-5: bla ma yang dag mnyes par bya //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-6: de nas yang dag brtul zhugs can //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-7: dge slong dge bsnyen dge slong ma //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-8: mchog tu gus pas mchod byas la //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-9: ji ltar 'os pa'i yon yang dbul //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-10: dung ngam rol mo sgra la sogs //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-11: bzang po'i glu dang gar rnams kyis //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-12: gnyen dang rigs rgyud 'khor rnams kyis //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-13: rol mo chen po mtshan mo dbul //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-14: de ltar thams cad phul zin nas //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-15: gang rung mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-16: phul lam 'bul bar byed pa rnams //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-17: slob dpon la ni dbul bya yi //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-18: bzo bo la ni mi sbyin zhing //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-19: dge slong rnams la'ang sbyin mi bya //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-20: slob dpon mchog gi lha yin te //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-21: nor rnams thams cad de la dbul //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-22: de nas dkyil 'khor byug bya ste //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-23: ba yi lci bas byugs bya zhing //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-24: rdul tshon chu bor rab dor ro //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-25: de yis yang dag legs par 'gyur //
K12D0486_H0451:96a-26: rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud rdzogs so ////
K12D0486_H0451:96a-27: kha che'i panti ta chen po dzny'a na badzra dang /
